edge: Both Anil Kapoor and Salman Khan are actors in the movie.
Anil Kapoor plays the character Kishan Singhania in the movie.
Salman Khan plays the character Prem Khanna in the movie.
Both Fardeen Khan and Salman Khan play characters named Shekhar 'Sunny' Wani in the movie.
Both Bipasha Basu and Esha Deol play characters named Bobby Saluja in the movie.
Esha Deol plays the character Pooja Khanna in the movie.
Lara Dutta plays the character Kajal Singhania in the movie.
Celina Jaitly plays the character Sanjana Saxena in the movie.
Boman Irani plays the character Param Kumar 'P. K.'
Neetha Shetty plays the character Preeti Koppikar in the movie.
Paresh Ganatra plays the character Jagmohan Kaushik in the movie.
Dinesh Hingoo plays the character Dr. Dilip Jaisingh, who is a hotel employee.
Pratima Kazmi plays the character Dhamini Gupta in the movie.
Razak Khan plays the character Johnny Toteywala in the movie.
Anjan Srivastav plays the character Judge Mrityunjay Saxena in the movie.
Sameera Reddy makes a cameo appearance as a beach girl in the movie.
